channel.title: mtgseattle on Roy Tang
channel.description: Recent content in mtgseattle on Roy Tang

item.title: New note
item.author: hello@roytang.net (Roy Tang)
item.description: Very humbling that as i was dropping out of #MTGSeattle, Kai Budde, who’s about the same age as me and started playing #MTG around the same time, made top 4 of the Mythic Championship, after having been semiretired for almost a decade!

item.title: New note
item.author: hello@roytang.net (Roy Tang)
item.description: Sigh. Dropped out of the #mtgseattle main event at 1-3. D: Deck didnt even want to play this time gave me 15 lands drawn in one game. Sad face

item.title: New note
item.author: hello@roytang.net (Roy Tang)
item.description: Ugh started out 1-2 at #mtgseattle. Time for the mythical 6-0 run!
